Rule.name: After Rule
Rule.Description: This rule is used by the Web Services connector to update parsed resource object and save connectorStatemap values.Create List of Objects which will later converted to Resource object and save connectorStatemap values to the application object permanently. The returned map will hold key 'data' for resource object list and key 'connectorStateMap' for udpated attribute that need to be saved in the application.

Argument.name: log
Argument.Description: The log object associated with the SailPointContext.

Argument.name: context
Argument.Description: A sailpoint.api.SailPointContext object that can be used to query the database if necessary.

Argument.name: application
Argument.Description: The application whose data file is being processed.

Argument.name: requestEndPoint
Argument.Description: The current request information contain header, body ,response object

Argument.name: processedResponseObject
Argument.Description: Response Object processed by the Web services connector

Argument.name: rawResponseObject
Argument.Description: Response Object returned from the end system

Argument.name: Map which contains updated Account/Group List and connectorStateMap
Argument.Description: Update information Map which contains parsed list of accounts/groups and connectorStateMap
